channel.title: Looking For Developmental Team Contentzpk New Rsps
channel.description:
I'm looking for dedicated individuals with experience in all of the following:
Coding Web Design Graphics Design Any other experience you may deem necessary to running a successful server
About the server
It is a 667 source. I have updated quite a bit on my own. The max combat is 209. Which means the max level is 150. Now before you run away the exp for 150 is not 2b. Its only 578m to get 150 in a skill which with the exp rates I put in place doesn't take very long. I have a few dedicated players always looking for more. We have custom content in every skill except for dung and slayer. Below is the list of updates I have done so far. There are some not listed as they weren't major changes.
[spoiler]12/20/2014 Pre CHRIMBO-Update
Added drops to the following Npcs:
Corporeal Beast 8133 Juggernaut- npc id 17176 will be hosting a event on sunday 12/21/2014 with this npc Bork-npc id 7133 KBD- santa added New weapon introduced with proper bonuses
12/24/2014 Hope everyone has a Merry Christmas
Added the following npc spawns:
Pk3r- npc id 17177 and 171778 Juggernaut- 17176
New home-rimmy New teles:
;;market(old home) ;;pktown(new npc spawn location)
Note: I will be in a future update adding these same npcs to the wild. They will be taking over.
1/3/2014 Fishing levels
Adding new fishing spots at the ;;fish location
New cage spot at 105 New harpoon spot at 115 New net spot at 130
Note: The 115 fish cannot be noted.
1/19/2014
New potion added into game
Level 85 to clean the snake weed herb Use it with zammy wine Level 105 to make it into new Super Sara Potion
1/20/2014
Added snake weed as seeds which require 99 to plant
Also added new tele ;;herb to tele u to men who drop new seeds and snake weed.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cjHMulK.png[/img]
You can now transfer the old 1b tickets into 2b tickets for 2 of them by typing ;;claimticket. You can also get this 2b ticket by having max cash in your inventory and clicking on it. You can also claim gp from this ticket by typing ;;claimgp. Image
New Theiving has been introduced it requres 115 theiving to access this stall the spice stall. After acquiring the key from the stall you simply go to the first floor at ;;castle and use the key on the chest. Image
Finally an update on Hunter and Runecrafting. The new rune you can make replaces the old runes used to veng and only needing 10 of them to veng. The new hunting npc is called a super chimp located at the original area caught the same way as the old chimps are.
[/spoiler]

item.title: Looking For Developmental Team Contentzpk New Rsps
item.dc:creator: @suseto suseto
item.description:
@suseto wrote:

I’m looking for dedicated individuals with experience in all of the following:

Coding
Web Design
Graphics Design
Any other experience you may deem necessary to running a successful server

About the server

It is a 667 source. I have updated quite a bit on my own. The max combat is 209. Which means the max level is 150. Now before you run away the exp for 150 is not 2b. Its only 578m to get 150 in a skill which with the exp rates I put in place doesn’t take very long. I have a few dedicated players always looking for more. We have custom content in every skill except for dung and slayer. Below is the list of updates I have done so far. There are some not listed as they weren’t major changes.

[spoiler]12/20/2014
Pre CHRIMBO-Update

Added drops to the following Npcs:

Corporeal Beast 8133
Juggernaut- npc id 17176 will be hosting a event on sunday 12/21/2014 with this npc
Bork-npc id 7133
KBD- santa added
New weapon introduced with proper bonuses

12/24/2014 Hope everyone has a Merry Christmas

Added the following npc spawns:

Pk3r- npc id 17177 and 171778
Juggernaut- 17176

New home-rimmy
New teles:

;;market(old home)
;;pktown(new npc spawn location)

Note: I will be in a future update adding these same npcs to the wild. They will be taking over.

1/3/2014
Fishing levels

Adding new fishing spots at the ;;fish location

New cage spot at 105
New harpoon spot at 115
New net spot at 130

Note: The 115 fish cannot be noted.

1/19/2014

New potion added into game

Level 85 to clean the snake weed herb
Use it with zammy wine
Level 105 to make it into new Super Sara Potion

1/20/2014

Added snake weed as seeds which require 99 to plant

Also added new tele ;;herb to tele u to men who drop new seeds and snake weed.

You can now transfer the old 1b tickets into 2b tickets for 2 of them by typing ;;claimticket. You can also get this 2b ticket by having max cash in your inventory and clicking on it. You can also claim gp from this ticket by typing ;;claimgp.
Image

New Theiving has been introduced it requres 115 theiving to access this stall the spice stall. After acquiring the key from the stall you simply go to the first floor at ;;castle and use the key on the chest.
Image

Finally an update on Hunter and Runecrafting. The new rune you can make replaces the old runes used to veng and only needing 10 of them to veng. The new hunting npc is called a super chimp located at the original area caught the same way as the old chimps are.

[/spoiler]
